display_long_description:
# Mixed Reality Magic

Your living room, backyard—even your bathroom—transforms into a high-stakes **drone playground**, courtesy of **Meta Quest 3**. Dodge virtual turrets, rescue hostages, and battle fires, all while staying anchored to your real-world surroundings.
[media]

# More Content to Come
[media]
Sky Runner is in active development and will be receiving more content in 2025! Make your voices heard by leaving your feedback on the Flat2VR Discord.

# Improved Visuals & Gameplay
Enjoy a **complete graphics overhaul** and refined drone mechanics. Plus, new obstacles like **magnetic fields** and **icy rings** put your piloting skills to the test.

# Create Your Own Courses
[media]
With our built-in track editor, you can design custom obstacle layouts—then challenge friends to beat your best time. From firefighting missions to wave-based combat—the possibilities are endless!

Ready to pilot drones in your own space?

**Sky Runner** brings you challenging missions, festive new content, and a chance to make a genuine difference—no expensive gear required. Grab your headset, join the fun, and help us **spread holiday cheer** to the kids who need it most.

[media]
